src:
聖誕美麗燕菜 派對必備小吃（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 03:40

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】聖誕派對必備的三色聖誕燕菜
Ingredient?材料 :●1st Layer (Red) 第一層紅色Roselle juice 400ml 洛神花水 400毫升Caster sugar 50g 細砂糖 50克Agar powder 1+1/3tsp 燕菜粉 1+1/3茶匙Jelly powder 1/4tsp 果凍粉 1/4茶匙** Roselle juice can be replace by Rose Syrup洛神花水可以用玫瑰糖漿代替**Recipe using Rose Syrup 用玫瑰糖漿的食譜 :Rose Syrup 80ml 玫瑰糖漿 80毫升Water 320ml 清水 320毫升Caster sugar 20g 細砂糖 20克Agar powder 1+1/3tsp 燕菜粉 1+1/3茶匙Jelly powder 1/4tsp 果凍粉 1/4茶匙
●2nd,4th,6th Layer（ White ) 第二，四，六層 白色Coconut milk 400ml 椰漿 400毫升Water 800ml 清水 800毫升Caster sugar 140g 細砂糖 140克Agar powder 4tsp 燕菜粉 4茶匙Jelly powder 1tsp 果凍粉 1茶匙
●3rd Layer （ Green ) 第三層 青色Pandan Leaf 3pcs 班蘭葉 3片Water 400ml 清水 400毫升➡️Pandan juice 800ml (use 400ml each layer) 班蘭汁800毫升Pandan juice 400ml 班蘭汁 400毫升Caster sugar 50g 細砂糖 50克Agar powder 1+1/3tsp 燕菜粉 1+1/3茶匙Jelly powder 1/4tsp 果凍粉 1/4茶匙
●5th Layer ( Red ) 第五層 紅色Same as 1st Layer 和第一層相同
●7th Layer ( Green ) 第七層 青色Same as 3rd Layer 和第三層相同* 1tsp =2.64g 1茶匙=2.64克
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701074.html
text:
Christmas beautiful Yancai party essential snacks (video)

06 Nov 2019, 03:40

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 06, 2019] Christmas party must have three-color Christmas Yancai
Ingredient? Material: ● 1st Layer (Red) First layer of red Roselle juice 400ml Rose water 400ml Caster sugar 50g Fine sugar 50g Agar powder 1+1/3tsp Yancai powder 1+1/3 teaspoon Jelly powder 1/4tsp 1/4 teaspoon of jelly powder** Roselle juice can be replaced by Rose Syrup Rosemary can be replaced with rose syrup **Recipe using Rose Syrup Recipe with rose syrup: Rose Syrup 80ml Rose syrup 80 ml Water 320ml Clear water 320 ml Caster sugar 20g fine sugar 20g Agar powder 1+1/3tsp Yancai powder 1+1/3 teaspoon Jelly powder 1/4tsp jelly powder 1/4 teaspoon
● 2nd, 4th, 6th Layer ( White ) Second, Four, Six White Coconut Milk 400ml Coconut Milk 400ml Water 800ml Water 800ml Caster sugar 140g Fine Sugar 140g Agar powder 4tsp Yancai Powder 4 Teaspoons Jelly powder 1tsp Jelly Powder 1 teaspoon
●3rd Layer (Green) 3rd layer of Pandan Leaf 3pcs Pandan leaves 3 pieces Water 400ml Water 400ml ➡️ Pandan juice 800ml (use 400ml each layer) Banlan juice 800ml Pandan juice 400ml Banlan juice 400ml Caster sugar 50g Fine Sugar 50g Agar powder 1+1/3tsp Yancai powder 1+1/3 teaspoon Jelly powder 1/4tsp jelly powder 1/4 teaspoon
●5th Layer ( Red ) Layer 5 Red Same as 1st Layer is the same as the first layer
●7th Layer ( Green ) The seventh layer Cyan Same as 3rd Layer is the same as the third layer * 1tsp =2.64g 1 teaspoon = 2.64g
The following YouTube video demo:
